#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define min(a,b) (a<b?a:b)
#define ll long long
int main() {
	// your code goes here
	ll t,n,m,i,a,b,next;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	    scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&m);
	    a=1,b=1;
	    while(--n)
	    {
	       a=(a+b)%m;
	       b=(a+b)%m;
	    }
	    printf("%lld/%lld\n",a%m,b%m);
	}
	return 0;
}
